name: Eunice
description: In this class, the teacher calls out the pose in Sanskrit together with the classical vinyasa count. This encourages independence and focus. The class is for the student to work on the efficiency of her/his practice. If you have not learned the full sequence of poses, you may sit and observe what is to come or simply stop at your last pose and finish on your own. You are also encouraged to modify as needed.

name: Eunice
ctname: Introduction to Ashtanga and Mysore-style Self-practice

name: Eunice
description: You will be guided through the Primary sequence from the very beginning with Surya Namaskar A and B.  You will learn how to flow in the sequence and experience the important elements for the practice.  The teacher will give additional instruction and hands on adjustments as necessary

name: None
description: Ashtanga yoga is traditionally not practiced on moon days (days of the full or the new moon) as the potential for injury is greater.  Ashtanga Yoga Cork is closed on moon days.
